acceptedAnswer.text: Warmly identifies anonymous website visitors using IP intelligence and intent data, then alerts your sales team via Slack or CRM when target accounts visit key pages. It also offers an AI agent that can engage visitors in real-time via chat.
Yes, Warmly offers a free tier that identifies up to 500 website visitors per month. The Business plan starts at $700/month for higher volume and advanced features.

mainEntity.name: How is Warmly different from Leadfeeder?

acceptedAnswer.text: Warmly goes beyond basic visitor identification by adding real-time AI chat engagement, multi-source enrichment via Clearbit and 6sense, and Slack-native alerting workflows. Leadfeeder focuses primarily on visitor identification and CRM sync.

hero.h1: Warmly: Website Visitor Intelligence & AI Engagement

org.verdict: Strong intent data with AI engagement capabilities

rep.verdict: Primarily a RevOps tool; reps use alerts passively

quickSummary.whatItDoes: Identifies anonymous website visitors using IP + intent data, sends real-time alerts to sales teams, and deploys an AI agent to engage high-value visitors via chat.
quickSummary.bestFor: RevOps and marketing teams who want to convert anonymous website traffic into pipeline by identifying and engaging target accounts in real time.
quickSummary.pricing: Free (500 visitors/mo). Business from $700/mo. Enterprise custom.

paragraphs: Warmly is a website visitor intelligence platform that de-anonymizes web traffic using IP resolution and intent data from partners like Clearbit, 6sense, and Bombora. When target accounts visit your site, Warmly alerts your team via Slack or CRM and can deploy an AI agent (Warmly AI) to engage visitors in real time via live chat. It's primarily a RevOps and marketing tool — individual reps interact with it through alerts, not through the platform directly.
whatIs.noteHtml: Note: Based on vendor docs and G2 reviews, not firsthand testing. See Warmly on G2.

features.title: Visitor De-Anonymization
features.description: Identify company and individual visitors using IP intelligence and intent data.

features.title: Warmly AI Agent
features.description: AI-powered live chat that engages high-value visitors automatically.

features.title: Slack Alerts
features.description: Real-time notifications when target accounts visit key pages.

features.title: Multi-Source Enrichment
features.description: Integration with Clearbit, 6sense, and Bombora for layered intent signals.

features.title: CRM Integration
features.description: Native Salesforce and HubSpot sync for visitor data and engagement.

features.title: Free Tier
features.description: Identify up to 500 visitors per month at no cost.

pricing.note: Pricing from warmly.ai. Business tier requires demo. Verify on their site.
pricing.creditNote: Free tier is limited to 500 identified visitors per month. Business pricing scales with traffic volume and enrichment depth.

g2Reviews.intro: Based on 300+ reviews on G2 (4.8/5 rating):

pros.text: IP-to-company resolution praised for reliability on B2B traffic
Warmly AI agent converts visitors who would otherwise bounce
Real-time alerts in Slack drive immediate sales action
Tracking snippet deploys in minutes; no dev team needed
Clearbit + 6sense + Bombora data layers add depth

cons.text: Free to $700/mo is a steep leap; no mid-tier option
Alert routing and workflows need operations expertise
Identifies companies well; specific contacts less reliable
Fewer integrations and less mature than established tools
IP resolution less effective for remote/WFH visitors

goodFit.heading: Good Fit If You:
items: Want to identify and engage anonymous website visitors in real time
Have a RevOps or marketing ops team to set up alert workflows
Need multi-source intent data to prioritize accounts
Want AI-powered chat engagement for high-value visitors
Run ABM campaigns and need web visitor intelligence

notAFit.heading: Likely Not a Fit If You:
items: Are an individual rep looking for a prospecting tool (use LeadIQ or Apollo)
Have low website traffic (under 1,000 monthly visitors)
Need a simple visitor ID tool without AI chat (Leadfeeder is cheaper)
Can't bridge the $0 to $700/mo pricing gap

verdict.bestFor: RevOps and marketing teams running ABM campaigns who want to convert anonymous web traffic into pipeline using real-time visitor intelligence and AI engagement.
verdict.avoidIf: You're an individual rep looking for a prospecting tool, your website has low traffic, or you can't justify the $700/mo minimum for advanced features.
verdict.bottomLine: Warmly stands out with its AI chat agent and multi-source enrichment — it goes beyond basic visitor ID to actively engage high-value accounts. But the steep pricing jump from free to $700/mo means it's best suited for teams with meaningful web traffic and a RevOps function to configure alert workflows.

org.explain: Strong intent data and AI engagement make it valuable for organizations with ABM-driven go-to-market motions and meaningful web traffic.

individual.explain: Reps interact with Warmly through alerts, not the platform. Not designed as a daily-use prospecting tool for individual contributors.

Quick start guide for basic visitor ID; advanced features need configuration
Users note alert routing and enrichment rules require RevOps expertise
Initial setup is fast; optimization of alert workflows takes 1-2 weeks

evidence.text: Warmly AI agent praised for converting visitors who would otherwise bounce
AI agent uses visitor context and intent signals for personalized engagement
Users report 15-25% increase in booked meetings from AI chat
AI engagement feature cited as primary reason for choosing Warmly over alternatives

Native Clearbit, 6sense, Bombora, Salesforce, HubSpot, Slack connectors

evidence.text: Free tier documented; Business tier listed at $700/mo but requires demo
Pricing jump from free to $700/mo is the most common concern
Users wish there was a mid-tier option between free and $700/mo

Enterprise plan supports unlimited visitors with custom pricing
Scales well for high-traffic B2B sites; less value for low-traffic sites

evidenceSignals.confidenceNote: Based on G2 reviews and vendor documentation. Newer tool with fewer total reviews than established alternatives, but high satisfaction scores and strong signal from early adopters.

evidenceGrid.text: Review sentiment: Praise: AI chat engagement and Slack alerts. Complaint: pricing jump and setup complexity
Community workflows: ABM alerting, AI chat engagement, CRM enrichment from web visits
Demo-verified: Visitor ID, Warmly AI chat, Slack alerts, CRM sync
Docs verified: Integration docs, AI agent capabilities, pricing tiers

strengthThemes: AI chat agent converts visitors who would otherwise bounce
Multi-source enrichment layers Clearbit + 6sense + Bombora signals
Slack-native alerts drive immediate sales team action
limitationThemes: Pricing jump from free to $700/mo with no mid-tier option
Alert routing requires RevOps expertise to configure
Individual visitor identification less reliable than company-level
evidenceSignals.disagreeNote: ⚠️ Where sources disagree: G2 reviewers praise AI chat conversion rates; Reddit users report results vary significantly by traffic quality and visitor intent level.

userVoiceThemes.heading: AI chat agent books meetings from anonymous visitors
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: The standout feature: Warmly's AI agent engages high-value visitors via chat in real time, using visitor context and intent signals to start relevant conversations. Early adopters report 15-25% increases in booked meetings from website traffic that previously went unengaged.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "Warmly's AI agent booked 12 meetings in its first month from visitors who would have just bounced. The ROI paid for the entire annual contract in one quarter."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and TrustRadius review themes

userVoiceThemes.heading: Free-to-paid gap is too steep for smaller teams
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: The most common complaint: jumping from $0 to $700/month is a steep commitment. Teams that outgrow the free tier's 500 visitors have no mid-tier option, making it hard to justify the upgrade without proven ROI from the free plan.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "The free tier proved the value — we could see exactly who was visiting our pricing page. But $700/mo is a big jump for a startup. Wish there was a $200/mo tier for growing teams."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and Reddit review themes

userVoiceThemes.heading: Powerful platform but needs RevOps to unlock full value
userVoiceThemes.synthesis: Users agree Warmly is capable, but getting the most from it requires RevOps expertise. Basic visitor ID works immediately, but the real value — targeted alerts, AI engagement rules, CRM enrichment — needs someone who understands routing logic and integration configuration.
userVoiceThemes.quote: "Warmly is incredibly powerful once it's configured properly, but 'properly' meant our RevOps lead spent two weeks building alert rules and enrichment workflows. Not a plug-and-play tool."
userVoiceThemes.quoteCite: Synthesized from G2 and TrustRadius review themes

pricingBreakdown.tldr: Free (500 visitors/mo). Business at $700/mo for AI agent and advanced features. Enterprise custom.
gotchas: Business pricing may scale with traffic volume
Enrichment depth (Clearbit, 6sense, Bombora) may require additional vendor subscriptions
AI agent feature only available on paid plans

greatAt: AI engagement: Warmly AI agent converts bouncing visitors into booked meetings automatically
Multi-source intent: Layers Clearbit + 6sense + Bombora for the richest visitor intelligence
Real-time alerts: Slack-native notifications when target accounts visit key pages
Free entry: 500 visitors/month identified at no cost to prove value before upgrading
ABM integration: Fits naturally into account-based marketing tech stacks
breaksAtScale: Pricing gap: $0 to $700/mo with no intermediate tier for growing teams
RevOps dependency: Alert routing and enrichment workflows need ops expertise
Individual ID limits: Company-level identification stronger than individual visitor resolution
Low-traffic sites: ROI diminishes below ~5,000 monthly visitors
Not for reps: Individual contributors interact via alerts, not the platform directly
whoShouldNotBuy: Individual reps: This is a RevOps/marketing tool, not a rep-facing prospecting platform
Low-traffic websites: Under 1,000 monthly visitors won't generate meaningful pipeline
Budget-constrained teams: $700/mo minimum is steep without proven web traffic ROI
Simple visitor ID needs: Leadfeeder is cheaper if you don't need AI chat engagement

implementationReality.note: JavaScript snippet installs in minutes. Basic visitor ID works immediately. Full alert routing, enrichment workflows, and AI agent configuration takes 1-2 weeks with RevOps support.

org.heading: Best for Sales Teams & RevOps
items: RevOps teams building account-based marketing workflows from web traffic
Marketing ops converting anonymous visitors into pipeline with intent data
Organizations with meaningful web traffic wanting AI-powered engagement

individual.heading: Best for Individual Reps
items: Reps who receive Warmly alerts via Slack and act on hot visitor signals
AEs monitoring target account engagement with their website
SDRs using visitor intelligence to time their outreach

faqs.question: What does Warmly do?
faqs.answer: Warmly identifies anonymous website visitors using IP intelligence and intent data, alerts your sales team via Slack or CRM, and can deploy an AI agent to engage visitors in real time via chat.

faqs.question: Is Warmly free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Warmly offers a free tier that identifies up to 500 website visitors per month. The Business plan starts at $700/month for higher volume and advanced features.

faqs.question: How is Warmly different from Leadfeeder?
faqs.answer: Warmly adds AI chat engagement, multi-source enrichment (Clearbit, 6sense, Bombora), and Slack-native alerting. Leadfeeder focuses on visitor identification and CRM sync.

emailCard.heading: Weekly Tool Intel
emailCard.description: Get honest tool comparisons and decision frameworks in your inbox.

finalCta.heading: Learn More About Warmly
finalCta.description: Visit their site for the free tier, a product demo, and to see their AI agent in action.

sources.name: G2
sources.whatFound: Strong praise for website visitor identification, real-time Slack alerts, and the free tier. Top complaints: limited data on smaller companies and the learning curve for setting up intent-based workflows.

sources.name: Reddit (r/salesops, r/LeadGeneration)
sources.whatFound: Warmly is frequently recommended as a free alternative to Clearbit Reveal and 6sense for website visitor identification. Common verdict: Warmly is the best free option; 6sense is better for enterprise intent data.

sources.name: YouTube (demos & walkthroughs)
sources.whatFound: Demos confirm website visitor deanonymization, real-time Slack alerts, and AI-powered outreach automation. The free tier and ease of setup are consistently highlighted as differentiators.

sources.name: Warmly.ai (vendor docs & pricing)
sources.whatFound: Pricing: Free (up to 500 visitors/mo), Startup $700/mo, Business $1,440/mo, Enterprise custom. Website visitor identification, intent signals, and AI outreach automation documented.

sources.name: Capterra
sources.whatFound: Smaller review set but consistent with G2 findings. Confirms Warmly is primarily used by growth-stage B2B SaaS companies with a PLG or inbound-led motion.
